titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 4 through April 8, 2022, as National Assistant Principals Week.
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of April 4 through April 8, 2022, as National Assistant Principals Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Assistant Principals Week.
